## setReferrerUrl() function

Override referrer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function setReferrerUrl(url: string, trackers?: Array<string>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | Custom Referrer which will be used as override |
|  trackers | Array&lt;string&gt; | The tracker identifiers which will be configured |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
